it.polimi.ingsw.ps42.model

Class Card

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.ps42.model.Card
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Card
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Class that represent the card object of the Lorenzo il Magnifico game
    Author:
    Luca Napoletano, Claudio Montanari
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • Card

        public Card()

      • Card

        public Card(java.lang.String name,
            java.lang.String description,
            CardColor color,
            int period,
            int level,
            java.util.List<Packet> costs,
            java.util.List<Effect> immediateEffects,
            java.util.List<Packet> requirements,
            java.util.List<Effect> permanentEffect,
            java.util.List<Effect> finalEffects)
        The constructor of the card
        Parameters:
        name - The name to give to the card
        description - A brief description
        color - The color of the card (Green, Yellow, Blue or Violet)
        period - The period of the card
        level - The level of the action in the card
        costs - All the packets that represents a cost (The costs are in "OR")
        immediateEffects - All the effects activated when the card is taken (The effects are in "OR")
        requirements - All the packets of the requirements (The requirements are in "OR")
        permanentEffect - All the effects activated with a yield (Green) or product (Yellow) action (The effects are in "OR")
        finalEffects - All the final effects activated at the end of the match (The effects are in "OR")

      • payCard

        public void payCard(Player player,
                    int choice,
                    Packet discount)
             throws NotEnoughResourcesException
        Method used to pay a card if is known which cost the player wants to pay
        Parameters:
        player - The interested player
        choice - The cost to pay
        discount - A possible discount (If there isn't a discount, set it to null)
        Throws:
        NotEnoughResourcesException - Thrown if the player hasn't enough resources

        Parameters:

        discount - A possible discount (If there isn't a discount, set it to null)
        Throws:

        private boolean controlPossibleChoice(java.util.List<Effect> effectList)
                               throws NotEnoughResourcesException
        Used to control which effect can be activated after a control done before this method
        Parameters:
        effectList - The list of effect to control
        Returns:
        True if the effect can be activated immediately, otherwise False
        Throws:
        NotEnoughResourcesException - Thrown if the player can't enable any effect
